Sample Request for Information: Pleasant Camp Port of Entry Redevelopment Project
===========================================================

### Important Details

| Category | Information | Reference |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Title | Request for Information – Pleasant Camp Port of Entry Redevelopment Project | English, French |
| Solicitation Number | WS4651655830 |  |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-07-25T14:00:00 |  |
| Posting Date | 2024-06-26 |  |

### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) of the Government of Canada is seeking information from contractors about the current and future capacity of General Contractor services for the Pleasent Camp Port of Entry Redevelopment Project. This project aims to provide essential services and infrastructure to the region.

### Contract Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End Users: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada, British Columbia

### Procurement Requirements

The project requires the services of a General Contractor, and only competitive bids will be accepted. The procurement method, terms, and conditions will be determined based on the contractors' responses to this request for information.

### Contact Information

To obtain more information about this project or to submit your responses, please contact:
Fung, Donna
Contact Email: [donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Reference Documents

* Tender Notice URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20139287?extsite=MjAxMzkyODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Timeline

* Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-25T14:00:00
* Posting Date: 2024-06-26

We hope to receive your responses to this Request for Information soon. To demonstrate your interest and outline your understanding of the project, please submit your response by the required deadline. We look forward to working with you.
